channel.title: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help
channel.description:
If anyone has that printer, or any printer like that (that at least scans and is in the 3200 series), I need help. Here the problem.
When I press 'Scan', I get this error message
[code] No Scan Options.
Refer to device documentation to trouble shoot.
Press OK to continue. [/code]
Please, help! It's really important!

item.title: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help

item.title: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Yes, using xp. I’ll take a look and post feedback. Thanks.

No, no error code was given.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: :D, 06:59:28 PM[/size][hr]Damn, didn’t work. Thanks anyways…

Oh damn dude, you gave me 2310, I need 3210.

Read full topic
item.source: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help

item.title: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Was an error code given?

EDIT:
I did a bit of research, and found it might could be the drivers. I assume you’re using Windows Xp. If not I can link you to the others.

[ul][li]
HP PSC 2310 All-In-One Basic software (No Network Support)[/li]
[li]HP PSC 2310 All-In-One Full Feature (No Network Support)[/li]
[li]HP PSC 2310 All-In-One Full Feature (Network Support)[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: HP Photosmart 3210 All-in-one Priner - Scanner - Copier ... Help
